    • Constructor Detail

      • IslandBoard

        public IslandBoard()
        This method builds the game board. The game board is represented as a matrix N*N where N is the dimension of the board. It doesn't need any parameter during the setting of the board.

      • getSpace

        public Space getSpace​(int coordinateX,
                      int coordinateY)
        Gets a single Space from the board.
        Parameters:
        coordinateX - indicates the X coordinate of the wanted space.
        coordinateY - indicates the Y coordinate of the wanted space.
        Returns:
        the desired Space.
